name: fist
effect: On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: If you hit, move the target 2 tiles in any direction.

name: ball bat
effect: Double your Throw Range while wielding this weapon. On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: If you hit, give the target Slow until the start of your next turn.
upgrades: Spiked - Bonus: If you hit, the target takes 1 damage every dice they spend on their next turn.
Metal Core - +1 Damage

name: club
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If you hit, give the target 1 Stun.
upgrades: Batton - Bonus: +1 Stun.
Torch - On Hit: Give the target 2 Burn. Bonus: +1 Burn

name: dagger
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Gain +1d4 damage.
upgrades: Silent - This weapon has +2 damage while you are Hidden.
Throwing - Double the Throw Range of this weapon.

name: hand crossbow
effect: On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: Gain +2 damage. Downside: Do not Autoload at the end of your turn.
upgrades: Repeater - +2 Ammo (Loading 3)

name: great hammer
effect: This Weapon does double damage against objects and structures. On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: If you hit, you may do 4 Knockback. Downside: You gain Slow until the start of your next turn.
upgrades: Proven - Bonus: Do +2 damage instead of Knockback.
Delayed - Knockback accumulates from this weapon and happens at the end of your Turn.

name: lance
effect: If you move 3 or more tiles before attacking, gain the Weapon Bonus. On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Do additional damage equal to half (rounded up) of how far you moved.

name: mace
effect: This Weapon does 2 extra damage to Prone targets. On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If the target is Rooted they become Prone.
upgrades: Knockdown - Bonus: If the target is Stunned they become Prone.
Glowy - This weapon gains Glow. (Can be used to cast spells)

name: whip
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Gain +2 Reaching.
upgrades: Spiked - +1 Damage
Ribbon - Bonus: Do a Grapple contest against the target.

name: brass knuckles
effect: On Hit: Do 1+BODY damage. Bonus: If you or the target are Grappled, gain +2 damage.
upgrades: Spiked - +1 Damage

name: sword
effect: On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: Gain +2 damage.
upgrades: Even Shorter - This weapon gains Side (counts as a Side Weapon)
Sharpened - +1 Damage

name: hand axe
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If you hit, remove 3 Shielding then do On Hit. Downside: -1 Damage.

name: spear
effect: If this weapon is Two Handed gain +2 damage and +2 Reaching. On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Do a Weapon Attack against all targets in a 2 tile line. Downside: No Reaching.
upgrades: Pike - +2 Reaching, Downside becomes: -2 Reaching.

name: greatsword
effect: On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: Gain +2 damage. Downside: -2 damage.

name: greataxe
effect: On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: If you hit, remove 5 Shielding then do On Hit. Downside: -2 damage.
upgrades: Halberd - This weapon gains 2 Reaching but has -1 damage.

name: crossbow
effect: On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: If you hit, remove 3 Shielding then do On Hit. Downside: Do not Autoload at the end of your turn.
upgrades: Balista - +2 Damage,-1 Speed while carried
tags: weapon, two-handed, range 12, loading 1, autoload, body 1

name: hand wraps
effect: On Hit: Do 1+MIND damage. Bonus: If you hit, move the target 4 tiles in any direction.
upgrades: Boxer - Do 1+BODY damage instead of 1+MIND
Rough - Bonus: If the target is Marked you may make them go Prone.

name: rapier
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: You may move 3 tiles before or after the Attack.
upgrades: Light - Bonus: +1 tile to move
Gilded - Damage becomes CHARM-1

name: stiletto dagger
effect: On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: If you hit, the target spends 1 Strain.
upgrades: Pin - This weapon has +1d4 damage while you are Hidden.

name: long bow
effect: On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: Gain +2 damage. Downside: -2 Damage.
upgrades: Arching - Targets do not gain the Hunker Down bonus to Dodge.
Stiff - +2 damage, -8 Range

name: short bow
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If you hit, give the target Slow until the start of your next turn.
upgrades: Composite - +1 damage, +3 range
Seriated Arrows - On Hit: Do 1 damage at the start of the hit target's next turn. (This effect stacks.)

name: popshard revolver
effect: On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: If you hit, you may spend 1 Strain then gain +1 damage and roll a d6. If the roll was less than or equal to the ammo left, spend 1 ammo, gain +1 damage, and roll again. Downside: -1 ammo.
upgrades: Heavyshard- +2 damage,-3 Ammo (Loading 3)
Quickload - This weapon gains Autoload.

name: popshard rifle
effect: This weapon has +8 Range while you are Prone. On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: If you hit, remove 3 Shielding then do On Hit. Downside: -1 Ammo.
upgrades: Longnose - +8 Range, while Prone gain +16 Range instead of +8
Heavyshard - +3 damage,-3 Ammo (Loading 1)
Bayonet - This weapon can be used for Melee Attacks.

name: popshard shotgun
effect: This weapon Attacks targets 1 tile to the left and right of the main target. On Hit: do 2 damage. Bonus: This weapon Attacks all targets within 1 tile of the main target.
upgrades: Quickload - This weapon gains Autoload.
Sawed Off - This weapon hits 2 tiles to the left and right but has -2 Range
Bayonet - This weapon can be used for Melee Attacks.

name: mage gauntlets
effect: On Hit: Do 1+SOUL damage. Bonus: If you hit, you may do 2 Knockback and may move 1 tile.

name: yoyo
effect: On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: Refund 1 Strain. Downside: No Reaching.
upgrades: Longer String - +2 Reaching, Downside becomes: -2 Reaching.

name: paladin hammer
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage and if you are Blessed become Empowered until the end of your turn. Bonus: Spend 1 Strain then choose: +3 damage, if you hit do 5 Knockback, or heal your MEDICINE.

name: crystal lanturn
effect: On Hit: Give 2 Burn. Bonus: If you hit, give 3 Burn instead.
upgrades: Residual Sparks - On Hit: Give the target Glow until the start of your next turn.

name: crystal staff
effect: On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: If you hit, give the target 1 Stun. Downside: No Reaching.

name: soul tome
effect: Gain +1 Max Strain. You can only hold 1 at a time. On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: Gain +1 damage.
upgrades: Heavy Tome - Gain +2 Max Strain (3 in total),-1 Speed while carried.
Painful Pages - +1 damage.

name: naturalist's shillelagh
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If you hit, choose:  give 1 Burn, Wet until the end of their next turn, or do 1 damage to a new target within 1 tile of the main target.

name: clothing
effect: While worn gives +1 Speed and Dodge.
upgrades: Soul Weave - Gain 1 Ward at the end of a Rest.
Flowing - When Slowed (or on Death's Door 1) gain +1 Speed after halving Speed.

name: light leather
effect: At the end of a Rest gain your LEVEL Shielding. While worn gives +1 Dodge.
upgrades: Custom Made - Choose a Sub-Stat. Gain +SUB-STAT Shielding.

name: medium chainmail
effect: At the end of a Rest gain 2xBODY + 2xMIND + LEVEL Shielding. While worn gives -1 Speed.
upgrades: Quick Release - When you have no Shielding gain +1 Speed.

name: heavy plate
effect: At the end of a Rest gain 4xBODY + 3xMIND + LEVEL Shielding. While worn gives -1 Speed and Dodge.
upgrades: Paladin - 4xBODY + 2xSOUL + LEVEL Shielding on Rest instead of default.

name: shield
effect: Uses 1 hand. At the end of a Rest gain your LEVEL Shielding. While held when you Hunker Down you act as having Half Cover from Ranged Attacks.
upgrades: Tower - +LEVEL Shielding
Warded - Gain 1 Ward at the end of a Rest.

name: bandage
effect: Spend # and the Bandage; Heal a creature within 1 tile of you 1+MEDICINE.

name: frag grenade
effect:
Spend ##; Throw the grenade to a point up to 6 tiles away. Do a Thrown Attack against everything within 2 tiles of that point. 
On Hit: Do 4 damage.
Bonus: Gain +2 damage.

name: flash grenade
effect: Spend ##; Throw the grenade to a point up to 6 tiles away. Everything within 2 tiles of that point is Blinded until the end of their turn. If a target is already Blinded they gain 3 Stun.

name: smoke grenade
effect: Spend ##; Throw the grenade to a point up to 6 tiles away. Everything within 2 tiles of that point is Obscured for 1 minute.

name: totem
effect: Spend ##; Activate or throw the totem to a point up to 6 tiles away. When activated, copy any Aura you currently have active. While you have an Aura the totem's Aura remains active.

name: grapple rope
effect: Spend #; Attach or throw the grapple up to 6 tiles away. Once attached creatures may climb the rope without rolling Body.

name: throwing knife set
effect:
Spend ##; Throw Attack a target up to 6 tiles away.
On Hit: Do 1 damage.
Bonus: Gain +2 damage.

name: bandolier
effect: Once per Break or Rest you may fully reload a weapon with Loading without spending dice. You may also equip a Side weapon without spending a dice.

name: spyglass
description: A brass folding spyglass with opaque blue glass.
effect: This spyglass can be used to see anything up to the horizon clearly.

name: upgrade kit
description: A set of small flimsy tools and parts.
effect: At the end of a Rest a creature may spend the Kit to give an item any Upgrade it may have. (You cannot give an item the same Upgrade twice.)

name: medkit
effect: Spend # and 1 Strain; Heal a creature within 1 tile of you MEDICINE.

name: trapper's tools
effect:
Spend ## and 2 Strain then pick Tripwire, Snare, or Popmine: Place a Trap within 1 tile of you. Creatures may spend # to do a Senses roll against you to detect Traps. Traps last until you deactivate them or they are triggered.
- *Tripwire* - Trap an area up to 1x3 tiles. Targets that move into this area go Prone, and may trigger attached Items.
- *Snare* - Trap an area up to 2x2 tiles. This must be attached to a ceiling. Targets that move into this area are Grappled and go up to 4 tiles into the air. The snare has 1 Health and +3 Dodge against targets it Grapples.
- *Popmine* - Trap a tile. Targets that move into the tile are moved up to 4 tiles in a direction. Direction chosen on placement. (This movement counts as Knockback and can take Knockback damage.)

name: thieves' tools
effect: You can use Thieving to unlock entryways or items, and can use Crafting or Thieving to disarm Traps.

name: alchemy tools
effect: You can use Medicine or Arcana to identify liquids. Spend ### and 3 Strain; Create a non-Magical Alchemy item which lasts until the end of your next Rest.

name: tunneler's tools
effect: Contains a lightsource and tools needed to spend 1 minute tunneling through 1 tile square of loose earth or stone. If you spend 1 minute and 2 strain you may tunnel through 1 tile square of solid stone.

name: tinker's tools
effect: Spend # and 2-CRAFTING Strain (min 0); Make any non-magical non-alchemical common or uncommon item. It lasts 1 minute then breaks.

name: antidote
effect: Spend # and the potion; You cannot gain effects from poisons for 1 minute, and remove any current effects from poisons when consumed.

name: alchemists fire
effect:
Spend ##; Throw the potion to a point up to 6 tiles away. The potion shatters on impact. Do an Item Attack against everything within 2 tiles of that point. Ground tiles ignite until the start of your next turn. Creatures which start their turn in this tile or move into it gain 2 Burn.
On Hit: Give 3 Burn.

name: fire skin potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you cannot gain stacks of Burn, but light anything you touch on fire.

name: oil skin potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you cannot gain stacks of Wet, have +2 when defending in Grapple contests, and when you gain stacks of Burn you gain +1 Burn.

name: stone skin potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you reduce all damage taken by 1 (to a minimum of 1), and are immune to Knockback, but have -2 Speed.

name: feather weight potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; Once poured onto a Target or Consumed for 1 minute (6 turns) the target's weight is reduced by half and they gain +2 Speed, but they have -1 Dodge.

name: blurry bottle potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) gain +1 Dodge, but have -1 to all Attack sums.

name: blind rage potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) do an extra +2 damage on all Attacks, but have -1 to all Attack sums.

name: fragile precision potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) gain +2 on all Attack sums, but have -1 damage on all Attacks.

name: dragon's power potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you Lock a 6 at the end of your turn. When this effect ends you cannot Lock dice for 1 minute (6 turns).

name: death's deal potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; You or a willing creature fully heal, but gain a stack of Death's Door.

name: soul stitch potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; You refund 3 Strain.

name: stat buff potion
effect: When created choose a Stat (Body, Mind, Soul, Arcana, Charm, Crafting, Medicine, Nature, or Thieving). Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you have +1 on the chosen Stat. (This does not affect Max Health or Strain.)

name: fire breathing potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you may Spend ## and gain 1 Burn to do a Spell Attack against up to 3 targets within 6 tiles of you. On Hit: Apply 3 Burn. On Miss: The target gains 1 Burn.

name: water breathing potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 hour you may breath water as if it was air.

name: potion of animal speech potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 hour you are able to have simple conversations with creatures that have the Animal Tag.

name: levitation potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; Once poured onto a Target or Consumed for 1 minute (6 turns) the target will move upwards 2 tiles at the end of their turn.

name: basic poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Put the poison in food or apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If put in food, when a creature eats the food, after 1 minute they take 6d4 damage. If applied to a weapon, if the weapon hits it deals an extra 1d4 damage.

name: armor rip poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, remove 3 Shielding then do other effects.

name: boiling blood poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, until the beginning of your next turn, the target gains 1 Burn when it takes damage from an Attack.

name: rockjoint poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, give the target Slow until the start of your next turn.

name: blightpetal poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, the target has -1 on all d12 rolls until the start of your next turn. (This does not stack.)

name: blinder poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, the target gains Blinded until the start of your next turn.

name: sleep poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; If the poison is consumed, whether in food or directly, the consumer falls asleep for 1 hour, until they take damage, or a creature spends ## to wake them.

name: truth serum
effect: Spend # and the poison; If the poison is consumed, whether in food or directly, the consumer cannot knowingly tell a lie for 1 hour.

name: wisp jar
description: A jar containing 3 floating pale rainbow wisps.
effect: Passively illuminates 2 tiles around it. Spend # and shake the jar to create 3 glowing floating wisps for up to 1 hour. Spend # to move the wisps up to 6 tiles. Each wisp cannot be more than 18 tiles away from the jar.

name: boots of waterwalking
description: A set of blue fish scale boots.
effect: While wearing the boots, the user can walk on water as if it were sandy land. The user can force their feet through the water in order to dive into it. Alternatively, they can put their feet on the surface while in the water to start to stand on it.

name: lightbolt pendant
description: A small yellow lightning bolt emblem on a simple leather cord.
effect: Spend # and break the pendant; For 1 minute gain 6 Speed.

name: basic art ring
effect: On creation pick any Art of level 3 or less. A creature wearing the ring may activate the Art without spending Strain up to 3 times per Break or Rest.

name: art imbuement stone
effect: At the end of a Rest a creature may spend the Stone and choose an Art they know to imbue an item with the chosen Art. Once per Rest, a creature may activate the Art without spending Strain.

name: soul gem
description: A purple quartz gemstone. If you listen closely you may be able to hear incomprehensible mumbling.
effect: Spend # to break the gem and get the benefits of taking a Break. Traits that give bonuses to others (such as *Field Repair* do not activate) and Art's durations do not end.

name: empty soul gem dagger
description: A clear quartz crystal, sharpened, placed on a brass handle.
effect:
On Hit: If the target is dead or lvl 4 or less Absorb their SOUL charging the Gem by their Level. If the target is lvl 5 or higher: Do 2 damage. 
Bonus: Gain +1d4 damage.
At 300 levels absorbed the Gem Becomes filled and you gain a Soul Gem.
upgrades: Silent - This weapon has +2 damage while you are Hidden.
Throwing - Double the Throw Range of this weapon.

name: mr cloud's prototype minigun
description: A quickly made minigun designed to rip the soul apart rather than the body.
effect:
This weapon requires ### to rev it before Attacks and stops being revved after an Attack. When revved do 2 Attacks per Attack action (same sum).
On Hit: The target spends 2d4 Strain.
Bonus: Stay revved.
tags: magical, weapon, two handed, range 18, body 2, mind 1

name: smoke mask
description: A solid obsidian mask that faintly emits smoke from the backside.
effect:
CURSED: When worn the mask Binds itself to the wearer. It cannot be removed willingly. When the wearer gains Wet they take 5 damage and if they are entirely submerged in a liquid they die (gain 3 stacks of Death's Door).
When worn the mask emits a thick black smoke enveloping the wearer. The wearer cannot gain stacks of Burn, gains +3 Ward on Rest, and their body becomes smoky allowing them to move through any space that their mask would fit through.

name: holy water
description: Water blessed with a divine power.
effect:
When in contact with a Monstrosity, Planar, or Undead they take 1d4 damage at the start of their turn and can't heal.

Spend ##; Throw the water to a point up to 6 tiles away. Everything within 2 tiles of that point gains Wet.
Spend # and the water; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, give Wet until the start of your next turn.
